name: Turtle-run
description:
100 years later, turtle evolution seriously threatens human life

Humans have launched a killing ring to the turtle, and the turtle must survive...

This is an open source game developed in Cantonese programming language.

How to Play:

A  :  turn left

D : turn right

W : turn up

S : turn down

K :  dig

L :  dig

Open source: https://github.com/Cantonese-community/Turtle-run

Cantonese programming language: https://github.com/StepfenShawn/Cantonese
